comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Sydney's older buildings and structures. , and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35766328@N04
comment._content: Hi, I hope its okay but I have used this photo in the Wikipedia article for Annandale, New South Wales. I have also cleaned up the sky in the photo as well. It can be viewed here commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Annandale_post_office.jpg

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/35766328@N04] Thanks for letting us know. We love to hear how our photos are being used.
